title: Mushroom turnovers
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 shallot, minced', '450g wild mushrooms, brushed clean and sliced', '2 cloves roasted garlic, minced', '100g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 bunch fresh thyme leaves, chopped', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '125ml cream', '1 (500g) packet frozen puff pastry, thawed']
